title: Four level pedigree with 5 answer options

content.question: In the pedigree above, circles represent females, squares represent males, and shaded figures represent individuals expressing a specific trait. The expression of this trait is most likely due to which of the following?

choices.label: A codominant relationship of a single pair of alleles

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
